LoginMapping.title: Login to Email Mapping
LoginMapping.description: Maps a plain text login name to a Firebase Auth email.

email.description: The user's actual email address for authentication.

Aisle.title: Aisle
Aisle.description: Represents an aisle within a store.

name.description: The name or number of the aisle.

storeId.description: The ID of the store this aisle belongs to.

address.description: The specific location of the product within the aisle.

quantity.description: The number of units in stock.

expirationDate.description: The expiration date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

storeId.description: The ID of the store this product belongs to.

aisleId.description: The ID of the aisle this product belongs to.

/logins/{loginId}.description: Maps a plain text login name to a Firebase Auth email. Publicly readable.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information, including their role.

/users/{userId}/stores/{storeId}.description: Stores created by a specific user.

/users/{userId}/stores/{storeId}/aisles/.description: Aisles within a specific store belonging to a user.
Products within a specific aisle, in a specific store, belonging to a user.
